page.title: 18Children in Oakley 2
page.content:
Despite owning many toys including those resulting from modern technology such as computers and electronic games many children still enjoy{skipping {games}and the accompanying rhymes. { {1}Maggie Thatcher has a cold Sitting on a box of gold. If you like her please don't shout. You are out !
{2}Ipa-dipa-dation, my operation. How many people at the station? COUNT {3}Red, white and blue.Dirty kangaroo. Went behind the bike shed. Out goes you.
{4}Mickey Mouse was in his house Pulling down his trousers. Quick mum, smack his bum. Out goes you !
